name: cartographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the making, drawing, or using of maps: The picture makes absolutely no attempt to be cartographically accurate. We passed a farm that was once adjacent to the river, cartographically speaking.
More examplesFewer examplesThe show is about a group of plane crash survivors on a cartographically indeterminate island.The area is spiritually, if not cartographically, about as far from the south of France as you can get. These are issues that cannot be represented cartographically.
